llm_res.rule: decimals function should return the number of decimals the token uses.
balanceOf: Returns the account balance of another account with address _owner.
The function SHOULD throw if the message caller’s account balance does not have enough tokens to spend.
The symbol function should return the symbol of the token, usually a shorter version of the name.
llm_res.function: function symbol() public view virtual override returns (string memory)
